channel.description: Ok i make you admin in my server if you help me fix this!! Ok i just got this now i duuno why when you hti a npc it does not give em damage and does not show nothin when you hit em and they can hit you PLZ HELP!!!!!

item.title: All GOOD CODERS COME HERE NOW!
item.dc:creator: @D27L7T D27L7T
item.description:
@D27L7T wrote:

[quote=“ChillScape!, post:1, topic:19013”]Ok i make you admin in my server if you help me fix this!!
Ok i just got this now i duuno why when you hti a npc it does not give em damage and does not show nothin when you hit em and they can hit you PLZ HELP!!![/quote]

Go into NPC.java and change your appendHitUpdate(stream str) to:

[code] protected void appendHitUpdate(stream str) {
try {
HP -= hitDiff;

        if (HP <= 0) {
            IsDead = true;
        }

        str.writeByteC(hitDiff);
        if (hitDiff > 0) {
            str.writeByteS(1); 
        } else {
            str.writeByteS(0); 
        }


        str.writeByteS(HP);       
        str.writeByteC(MaxHP); 
    } catch (Exception e) {
        e.printStackTrace();
    }
}[/code]

Read full topic
item.source: All GOOD CODERS COME HERE NOW!
